question: Determine True or False: This is the leading note in E major. <image 1>
description: The image shows a musical notation with a bass clef symbol on the left side. The staff consists of five horizontal lines. A single note is placed on the second line from the top, which corresponds to the note D in the bass clef. There are no accidentals (sharps or flats) present in the image. The note is an open note, indicating it is a whole note.
